alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 11:18AM EST until January 31 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Sycamore Creek At Holt affecting Ingham County. Red Cedar River At East Lansing affecting Ingham County. .Half inch to an inch of rain has fallen on a deep snowpack leading to runoff and melting. Rivers are expected to rise causing minor flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Cedar River at East Lansing. * WHEN...From this morning to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of low lying areas, adjacent parks, and farmland. At 8.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of the Michigan State University athletic fields. The Potter Park Zoo parking lot in Lansing begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 5.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 7.7 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.8 feet on 01/14/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Red Cedar River East Lansing 7.0 5.4 Fri 10 am ES 6.8 7.6 7.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr. Next issuance statement expected by Saturday afternoon at 130 PM EST.
